entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 2100 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries or rain showers after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Snow level 2500 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
